short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Salesforce Quick Access and Helper Extension By @Imtiyaz_Ansari

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is Salesforce Quick Access and helper extension for salesforce developers to quickly check salesforce metadata like apex, lwc, email templates, custom labels, vf pages and components and many more, and also  view records table, view record and edit records and create debug logs, search view and many more inside.
